description:
'''James Francis Cauty''' (born 19 December 1956), also known as '''Rockman Rock''', is an English artist and musician, best known as one-half of the duo [[the KLF]], co-founder of [[the Orb]] and as the man who [[K Foundation Burn a Million Quid|burnt Â£1 million]].

He is married to artist and musician [[Alannah Currie]], a former member of [[Thompson Twins]].
